Haskell Civic Center
====================

![](https://haskelltexasusa.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/10/Civic-Center-1024x768.jpg)

The Haskell Memorial Civic Center was officially opened in 1985. The largest facility of this nature in the surrounding counties, it sits at the crossroads of Highway 277 and Highway 380 in the Haskell Expo Center, a complex of facilities which includes a Rodeo Arena, a livestock show barn, and an outdoor pavilion. The Civic Center is presently owned and managed by the City of Haskell.

To rent this facility, please contact the City Secretary at (940) 864-2333 or [citysecretary@haskelltexasusa.com](mailto:citysecretary@haskelltexasusa.com).

FEATURES
--------

* 12,000 sf Multipurpose Building
* 4,400 sf auditorium
* 720 sf elevated stage with 2 backstage dressing rooms and a bathroom
* 1150 sf lobby/registration area
* 1800 sf multipurpose room with serving kitchen and window
* Handicapped accessible restrooms

* 800 sf conference room with easy access to kitchen
* 500 sf kitchen with 2 upright freezers, refrigerator, microwave, 2 electric ovens, 1 gas oven, warming drawer, 40 sf island, large prep space
* 225 sf outdoor, covered BBQ area with 30 sf wood burning grill and prep table

[![](https://haskelltexasusa.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/civic-center-2-copy-374x280.jpg)](https://haskelltexasusa.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/civic-center-2-copy.jpg)

[![](https://haskelltexasusa.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/civic-center-1-copy-374x280.jpg)](https://haskelltexasusa.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/civic-center-1-copy.jpg)
